hints.title: Online Phase Transition Detection
hints.content:
3189: :label: alg-online-phase-detection
3190: 
3191: **During Adaptive Gas run:**
3192: 
3193: 1. **Collect samples**: Every $K$ iterations, store $(x_k, v_k)$ snapshot
3194: 2. **Estimate curvature**: Use Algorithm {prf:ref}`alg-ruppeiner-curvature` with importance reweighting
3195: 3. **Track $R_{\text{Rupp}}(t)$**: Plot curvature vs. iteration
3196: 4. **Detect peaks**: If $|R_{\text{Rupp}}(t)| > R_{\text{threshold}}$, flag potential transition
3197: 5. **Adjust parameters**: Optionally adapt $\alpha, \beta$ to steer toward/away from criticality
3198: 
3199: **Use cases:**
3200: - **Optimization**: Avoid getting stuck in local minima (indicated by negative curvature spikes)
hints.raw_directive:
3186: For the Fragile Gas practitioner, curvature monitoring provides a real-time diagnostic:
3187: 
3188: :::{prf:algorithm} Online Phase Transition Detection
3189: :label: alg-online-phase-detection
3190: 
3191: **During Adaptive Gas run:**
3192: 
3193: 1. **Collect samples**: Every $K$ iterations, store $(x_k, v_k)$ snapshot
3194: 2. **Estimate curvature**: Use Algorithm {prf:ref}`alg-ruppeiner-curvature` with importance reweighting
3195: 3. **Track $R_{\text{Rupp}}(t)$**: Plot curvature vs. iteration
3196: 4. **Detect peaks**: If $|R_{\text{Rupp}}(t)| > R_{\text{threshold}}$, flag potential transition
3197: 5. **Adjust parameters**: Optionally adapt $\alpha, \beta$ to steer toward/away from criticality
3198: 
3199: **Use cases:**
3200: - **Optimization**: Avoid getting stuck in local minima (indicated by negative curvature spikes)
3201: - **Exploration**: Deliberately induce high curvature to explore phase space boundaries
